  • Game

The Wolf's Bane has an eerie atmosphere and an eerie soundtrack that only heightens the horror lurking in the shadows. Werewolves are on the loose in a small village, but luckily there is a werewolf hunt. The game comes with a bonus game and a free spins feature where you will get 1 out of 4 wild extras. Here's a decent looking game, but nothing out of the ordinary. It all plays out on 5 reels, 3 rows and 10 ways to win.

  • There is a bonus game
  • Free spins feature
  • Stylized interface
  • High quality graphics
Play

Games are available to persons over 18 years of age.
